small.description: Minimum size for small touch targets, used for compact UI elements.

medium.description: Recommended size for most touch targets, ensuring accessibility.

large.description: Optimal size for large touch targets, providing extra comfort.

small.description: Minimum spacing between touch elements to avoid accidental taps.

medium.description: Recommended spacing between touch elements for better usability.

large.description: Generous spacing for touch elements in relaxed layouts.

swipeThreshold.description: Minimum distance a swipe gesture must travel to be recognized.

tapDuration.description: Maximum duration for a tap gesture to be considered valid.

longPressDuration.description: Minimum duration a touch must be held for a long press.
